mapper.update: update supplier set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charter = #{charter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, charter, status, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user from supplier where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, charter, status, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user from supplier
